creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: ten lines of calligraphy, on a fan, alternating between three characters and one character; signature at far L; rectangular relief stamp at URC; two square intaglio stamps LLC; mounted on cobalt blue board
markings: URC, rectangular relief stamp; LLC, square intaglio; LLC, square intaglio; on back of mount, L center, in red: [Hirose Tanso]
title: Poetic Quatrain
